/*
 *Problem code: PALIN  
 * Author- Rishabh
 * 
 */
 
 #include<iostream>
 #include<cstdio>
 #include<math.h>
 
 using namespace std;
 
 
 int nDigits(int N);
 int reverse(int N);
 int main()
 {
 	
 	int T,N,numDigits,frstHalf,midHalf,scndHalf,rev;
 	scanf("%d",&T);
 	while(T--){
 		
 		scanf("%d",&N);
 		numDigits=nDigits(N);
 		if(numDigits%2==0){
 			frstHalf=N/pow(10,numDigits/2);
 			scndHalf=N%(int)pow(10,numDigits/2);
 			
 			
 			rev=reverse(frstHalf);
 			if(rev>=scndHalf){
 				printf("%d\n",(frstHalf*(int)pow(10,numDigits/2))+rev);
 			}
 			else if(rev<scndHalf){
 				frstHalf=frstHalf+1;
 				rev=reverse(frstHalf);
 				printf("%d\n",(frstHalf*(int)pow(10,numDigits/2))+rev);
 			}
 		}
 		else{
 			frstHalf=N/pow(10,numDigits/2);
 			scndHalf=N%(int)pow(10,numDigits/2);
 			
 			rev=reverse(frstHalf/10);
 			if(rev>=scndHalf){
 				printf("%d\n",(frstHalf*(int)pow(10,numDigits/2))+rev);
 			}
 			else if(rev<scndHalf){
 				frstHalf=frstHalf+1;
 				rev=reverse(frstHalf/10);
 				printf("%d\n",(frstHalf*(int)pow(10,numDigits/2))+rev);
 			}
 		}
 	}
 }
 int reverse(int N){
 	
 	int inv=0;

        while (N>0)
        {
                inv = inv * 10 + (N%10);
                N = N / 10;
        }

        return inv;
 	
 	
 }
 int nDigits(int N){
 	int digits=0;
 	if(N==0){
 		return 1;
 	}
 	while(N){
 		N=N/10;
 		digits++;
 	}
 	return digits;
 }
